entities.name: petunia
entities.description: Petunia is introduced as the one pointing to food on the kitchen table. She is already wearing a cocktail dress.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as washing his hands and eating supper.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is introduced as the one whisking away Harry's supper.

relationships.description: Petunia points to two slices of bread and a lump of cheese on the kitchen table.
Harry washes his hands and bolts down his pitiful supper.
Aunt Petunia whisked away Harry's supper.
